name: The Adventurer
description:
Ellen is a loud mouthed adventurer who  is up for any task no matter how dangerous.  In this game you will be exploring an unknown planet with Ellen in order to find treasures and great secrets but be careful, something doesn't want you there... Solve puzzles and fight enemies in order to prove your worth.

Press page found below

https://www.doc.gold.ac.uk/~egard001/gamedev/the-adventurer/press
